titleInfo.title: Chattanooga, Agency, Western & Atlantic Rail Road. Rules. 1852.

mods.abstract: Printed Broadside: Chattanooga, Agency, Western & Atlantic Rail Road. Rules Established for the Government of Affairs of this Agency, Relating to Shipment and Receiving Merchandise. [lists 8 rules, the first five governing the procedures for handling freight and the remaining three rules establishing the required behavior and conduct of personnel while they are in the station or on the platform]. "All of the foregoing Rules must be observed by those transacting business at the Agency. March 25, 1852. Wm. M. Wadley, General Superintendent W. & A. R. R." [Chattanooga: 1852].
